title: Preserved extremely well
text: Great seeing all of these monuments of the Gods. To live in those bygone years. To truly see these monuments in their Glory!! Glad to know that Greece, like ITALIA, is preserving their history for future descendants to see and glorify over. It's a WONDROUS experience!!

title: Father of the Gods
text:
My Very favorite god, Zeus, Father of the Gods. Got interested in Greek Mythology because of him alone. To visit the Home of this particular god and his kids, wife, father --> was Truly a dream come true.

For this, I thank Athina very much and Loved this vacation, much more than my Paris vacation couple of weeks prior.

Definitely will be visiting Greece again in 2021 & 2022!!

title: Huge spectacular monument
text: Walking along and ran into this building. It's so Ancient, so gothic. Love this about Greece. You walk and see remnants of Ancient Times and you just have to stop and gawk and marvel. It's something that is so Underrated. Here in the US we don't have history like this so it's That much more precious to see it when in Europe. It's mind-boggling!! They have All this history every step they take. It's Surreal and j hope they appreciate it as much as daily visitors do.

title: Acropolis Walk
text:
Walked up the hill. The view was Spectacular. It's a bigger area than I realized. This led up to the Pantheon. It was a truly momentous time and truly enjoyed myself immensely while visiting Greece for the 2nd time and Athina for the 1st.
It's very much so worth visiting and glad to know that Greece is rebuilding and recapturing its Glory again!!

title: Great fun and walking and touring
text: It was a great time. Walked and shopped many days, many times. Enjoyed all I saw and experienced. Walking around is the very best since you never know what you'll run into and getting lost is absolutely a Must

title: Shopping is SO much fun and inexpensive
text: Satyrs/ Satyrus: God of Fertility is Very important to the Grecians which became very apparent as I walked around the area. Met so many interesting shops and their owners. Bought Vinsanto wine (Excellent!!), Mastika (So Good!!). Spent quite a number of days shopping here. Bought tshirts inscribed with my name in Greek!!

title: Great view of the House of the Gods
text: Great, spectacular view. Absolutely worth the visit. Walking to the Acropolis to get here was worth it. Felt the presence of the history of this magnificent city

title: Great View of Acropolis and Pantheon
text:
View and walk was spectacular. Walking up that hill to reach this area was great exercise. View alone was worth the walk.

Learned so much from the tour guide and just meandering by myself.

title: FABULOUS hotel and people who work there
text: Not too far from Athina Airport. Within walking distance, about 35 mins, from Plaka and Monastiraki. Absolutely enjoyed Continental breakfast every morning (scrambled eggs, omelet, sunnyside-up eggs), European bacon, croissants, etc. Food was Very good. The staff was AWESOME!! Great and fun-loving individuals. If ever back in Athina, definitely will book here again. Absolutely had a Great time at this hotel (thanks for suggestions to Athens Sports Bar so I can view AFC Championship game!! And that bigger liquor store 2 blocks away. AWESOME!!)

title: Huge and then Bigger than you can imagine
text: Lovely. One of few attractions worth visiting in Oaris especially since striking so you could Not leave the country, much less the city. I was Very lucky to get back to the USA. Loved it!! Massive structure but be aware: Mona Lisa is encased in glass and less than 8×11" big. Huge disappointment and then some!!

title: Seine River - be aware
text: Lovely. One of few attractions worth visiting in Oaris especially since striking so you could Not leave the country, much less the city. I was Very lucky to get back to the USA. The water was Beyond disgusting to view. You drop something in there, don't bother to retrieve it. It's just Not worth your life.

title: Worst Vacation in Europe Ever!
text:
Staff very helpful and nice. The location was further from tourist location than expected, at least 52 minutes walk daily to major attractions especially since trains and buses were inoperable because of their Strike.

Truly frustrating and Extremely inconvenient.

title: Worst Hotel Ever
text:
Right outside the reception so heard everyone come and go, heard breakfast start and end, heard all conversations, even if I didn’t want to.

And the Old man thinking i wanted to “steal” any of his Stale drinks from that little excuse of a fridge. I was Extremely insulted. And did i mention that the toilet was practically in the shower?! Yeah, so Fortunate was i that my original booking was moved to this Heckhole of an excuse for a “hotel”?!?!

But then again, it’s Europe. You put toilet in shower, a bed in a hallway and rent it out and it’s Acceptable.

I did NOT pay good money to sleep in the “Hallway” and that’s how I felt!! Will Never recommend this place to Anyone!

title: Il Grillo, Gelateria
text:
This is an AWESOME plaza.

They have restaurants, Gelaterias around this area.

My FAVORITE pizza place, Il Grillo is within this plaza. I buy Funghi Mozzarella with no tomato from here every day whenever I visit FIRENZE.

And across is my FAVORITE Gelateria place named Gelateria. Pistachio, Fior di Latte, Stracciatella. I ALWAYS get this combo of gelato.

It's AWESOME!! The plaza is so big and at times, people put on entertainments for everyone to sit and enjoy!!

ABSOLUTELY love this plaza!!!

title: ALWAYS a pleasure
text:
Great time around this area.
Always packed, regardless of the season.

The Hub from where I find everything that I need.
Always walk this area whenever i visit SORRENTO!!

The stores that lead from here is always fascinating to visit.

The sandali shops leading from here are just WONDERFUL!!

title: Enjoyed the limone and Arancia candies
text:
Absolutely fantastic!!
Always a hit with friends and family.
Great store!
Wished would've been there previously since the prices are really affordable!!

title: ENORMOUS Piazza
text:
Massive!! Extremely crowded!
But absolutely glorious on sight.
Enjoyed walking thruout the piazza.
Enjoyed buying Murano jewelry within this piazza.

It TRULY is a wonder to behold!

title: Nicer than I expected
text:
Room was spacious. Any little requests were seen to ASAP. Breakfast was very good, enjoyed the scrambled eggs.

The bacon could've been cooked a tad more, but otherwise, very enjoyable.

Very close to the train and bus stations. In close enough proximity to the Rialto Bridge and San Marco.

It was truly a very welcomed stay and I wouldn't hesitate in staying here again.

title: Chocolates everywhere
text:
Loved the look and the chocolate waterfall display in the window.

Enjoyed the samples they gave out.
Didn't buy since already bought so much chocolates previously.

Next time, definitely will buy since I did see many that interested me.

title: Burano and Murano
text:
Took it since bought 20€ day-pass. Absolutely saved €€ this way. Journey was smooth and view great.

Wish would've done my homework on previous visits to Venezia, but I learned and this was just wonderful!!

Bought lots of scarves from Burano, Murano jewelry and masks from there. Just AWESOME!!

Went over to Murano and bought Murano wine stoppers.

Great way to travel.

title: View is MAGNIFIQUE
text:
BELLISIMO!! Bought tons of things around this area: Murani jewelry, Bellini, wallets, tshirts, wine stoppers.

And the view is FANTASTIC!!

title: BELLISIMO
text:
Grom is ALWAYS BELLISIMO.
I never not buy gelato upon visiting Venezia and I always seek out GROM!!

Good service, better gelato!!
place: GROM - Il Gelato come una volta

title: Gorgeous bag...couldn't decide amongst 2
text:
Just LOVELY. 2 different type of leather --> 1 for the body and other for the handle.

Bag finally selected is BEYOND lovely and SO soft.

Love it!!!

title: FINALLY ventured within after bypassing for 2 years
text:
Very nice. Spacious. So many shops within.

Was able to order 2 wines and Aperol Spritz to go.

Very satisfied with purchase.

Went to another 'stall' and purchased chocolates as well.

Great experience all the way around

title: Chocolates Galore!!
text:
Bought too many bars!@
Bought too many of the chocolate truffles!!

Live Venchi --> great chocolates, very good and helpful customer service.

Always a pleasure stepping within.

title: On my way to Scuola dei Cuoio
text:
Had to pass this to get to Basilica dei Croce.
Seen this MANY times but never realized its significance but now I do and truly HUMBLED!!

Love is Firenze and its many splendors!!

title: Finally!!
text:
Beautiful. Was looking for Scuola dei Cuoio and didn't realize I'll have to pass this WONDER to get there.

Truly beautiful. Reminds me somewhat of the Basilica at Amalfi in the Amalfi Coast.

Beautiful. Never get tired of seeing different Basilica

title: Very crowded
text:
Expensive!! Gorgeous pocketbooks!! ABOVE quality gold. ABOVE quality leather shops!!

This area is truly for the affluent!! I could only watch and marvel.

Enjoyed FINALLY crossing over the bridge to see the WONDER on the other side!!

Firenze NEVER disappoints!!

title: Very interesting. Entered Ponte Vecchio for 1st time
text:
Always wanted to go and never had opportunity.

Crowded, expensive and all around, my kind of place!!

LMAOOOOO
Enjoyed the area immensely

title: Bigger room than thought I would receive
text:
I truly have no complaints.
Room is quite spacious for solo visitor. Room can accommodate 2, if truth be known.

Staff VERY accommodating esp for my additional towel requests and when I have a brain freeze and can't figure out how to turn on TV or turn off lights.

I'm on vacation, I'm automatically in Stupid mode and I thank them for not holding that against me.

Overall, no complaints. On the 1st floor and although others have complained abt the noise, I'm a New Yorker and noise is my lullaby so does not bother me at all.

My ONLY concern/peeve --> shower is WAY too small. It's closed in and if I weighed more, no way i would EVER fit. I turn around and accidentally turn off the water.

They could've made it a tad bigger. Feel almost like I'm in a standup coffin --> it's THAT confining.

Otherwise, I am 90% satisfied with my room and my stay here. I would stay again especially since SO close to Firenze Santa Maria Novella Stazione.

Grazie and Ciao!!!

title: 1st time there
text:
Interesting location. Saw students working via looking thru window. Very interesting.

Ventured within. Nice snakeskin bracelets for 20€. Didn't bother to purchase.

Saw other VERY expensive clutch purses/wallets and BEYOND lovely bags.

All in all, I'm very glad I went.

title: Funghi Mozzarella, as always
text:
My FAVORITE pizzeria in ALL if ITALIA.
When I visit Firenze, must go here at least 2 notes to order my one and only.

They NEVER disappoint and hope they will not in the future.

title: A MUST when visiting San Gimignano
text:
Visited back in October of 2018. Bought 2 pocketbooks while my sisters bought 4 more combined.

Came back in March and purchased 5 more myself. Couldn't help myself!! Their merchandise is GORGEOUS and so SOFT!!!!

If I didn't stop myself, could've purchased another 4, EASILY!!

One, if not, THE best leather store in all of San Gimignano!!

Ladies, Grazie, Grazie, Grazie a thousand times!!!

Ciao!!

title: 1st time eating gelato here
text:
Very, very tasty. Enjoyed it immensely.
Usually I buy from Gelateria Dondoli but I wanted to try something different.

I was NOT disappointed. Very good Fior di Latte and Pistachio.

Grazie and Ciao

title: BELLISIMO sandali, BELLISIMO husband & wife runned business. Just LOVELY experience!!!
text:
Sent email 5 to 7 weeks ago for 9 custom made sandali.

Received email a week before I arrived in that all 9 were CREATED!! UNBELIEVABLE!! INCREDIBLE!!!

Absolutely BELLISIMO!!!
There's doing a job well-done and then there's going ABOVE and BEYOND a customer's expectation and this couple did the latter.

I felt 100% comfortable that I had chosen the correct shop to handle my business especially since the transactions cost me quite several hundred Euros. It was money VERY well spent.

I TRULY can't thank you enough from my family, my friends and myself. We all will enjoy wearing our sandali this upcoming Spring and Summer and many more.

Wasn't aware that they didn't contribute to the 22% Tax Free 'promotion' so could only take 2. Sad to know since if I knew previously I would've either just had the 2 made or still purchased the 3.

Regardless of the misunderstanding, the quality of the sandali were UNQUESTIONABLY BELLISIMO!!

Grazie and Ciao!!

title: Sandali --> SIMPLY lovely
text:
Sent email weeks ago for 3 custom made sandali.
I went on Monday and they were already made.
Absolutely BELLISIMO!!

Wasn't aware that they didn't contribute to the 22% Tax Free 'promotion' so could only take 2. Sad to know since if I knew previously I would've either just had the 2 made or still purchased the 3.

Regardless of the misunderstanding, the quality of the sandali were UNQUESTIONABLY BELLISIMO!!

Grazie and Ciao!!

title: Funghi Mozzarella
text:
Quick service. Wonderful and welcoming atmosphere.

Very helpful servers.

Loved every aspect of my visit. My funghi mozzarella was simply DIVINE!!

title: Baci al Limoncello... BELLISIMO find!!
text:
Absolutely fantastic!! Didn't think they would have them since ONLY ever found in Amalfi but they did and purchased 5 of them as well as Limoncello!!

Grazie and Ciao!!

title: Baci al Limoncello
text:
Absolutely fantastic!! Didn't think they would have them since ONLY ever found in Amalfi but they did and purchased 5 of them as well as Limoncello!!

Grazie and Ciao!!

title: Love them!!
text:
Bought gorgeous bag and wallet.
Whenever I get to SORRENTO, stopping here is a MUST!! Always buy something --> pocketbook or wallet or both.

Highly recommended! Bought this BEYOND soft wallet (deer Cuoio (??)) and the burgundy bag. My sister loved them when I sent the pics to her.

Thanking both the Dad and Daughter duo again.

Grazie and Ciao!!!!

title: San Gimignano is just a lovely town
text:
Just lovely town that has FABULOUS stores. FABULOUS Gelateria, and just other stores that contain affordable merchandise. It's just a small wonder in the overall Toscana landscape!!

Been here before and still enjoy all that they have here. Bought more than I thought I would've.

Can't wait to go back and spend even more €€€€ here!!!

title: Best GELATERIA outside Roma & Firenze
text:
The lines were long.
They were ABSOLUTELY worth it!!
Been here before and always look fwd to it.

Just be something in the water in San Gimignano because this Gelateria is FABULOUS!!!

Could never visit San Gimignano and not buy gelato from here. Absolutely irresistibly!!

title: Wonderful bags!! Sisters went BEYOND crazy
text:
Lots of bags. Did my homework before so knew which pocketbooks I wanted.
Luckily for me, I was able to find the ones I wanted and others that I didn't realize I NEEDED.

Beautiful shop!! Even more beautiful merchandise.

My sisters went crazy within as well. Spent €€€s on bags within that just couldn't leave behind.

Went back to get the wallet to match the bag just bought. Sisters said this was one of the BEST trips and cities they've ever been to and THOROUGHLY enjoyed this store!!

title: High Tides HELL!!
text:
Wasn't aware of the high tides. Could NOT have prepared myself for this.

Having to carry my own luggage from San Marco-Zaccaria water taxi stazione one piece at a time...UNBELIEVABLY!!!

Having to roll up my jeans to my knees and take off my footwear and do this for about almost 2 hours was NOT how I planned to commence my vacation, but that's how it began.

WORSE start to a vacation EVER!!
The hotel not able to provide a porter or someone to assist us was even more of an unwanted experience that I NEVER want to experience again.

I DON'T fully blame the hotel but Hotel Daniela was more prepared and hadca?porter and was more helpful.

I will NEVER again stay at ANY hotel pass Rialto Stazione.

We were stuck indoors for 2 days. Our tours for 2 days were cancelled and fully refunded.

NEVER again will I travel to VENEZIA during the months of October to early March.

Not worth taking the chance.

I love VENEZIA but refuse to spend $$$$/€€€€ to vacation and then be stuck in rooms for 2 of my 3 vacation days.

That's NOT why I travelled to this beautiful city. I travelled to tour your lovely city and spend €€€. I barely did either.

Just CAN'T take the chance again.
WORST part of my vacation EVER!!!!

title: Piazza di Spagna
text:
Just LOVELY!! Leads to the Borghese Galleria which is a wonder of and in of itself!!

Those steps are a wonder to behold and walk up.

And it reminds me of 5th Avenue with all the top brand name brand stores.
LOVE Furla!!!

title: Nice location, accessible to all touristic sites
text:
After reading abt all the reviews, wasn't looking forward to this. But our room was spacious enough for my 2 sisters and myself.

Very close to Fontana di Trevi, Colosseo, Forum and the "Wedding Cake".

Close enough to get to Della Palma and Giolitti, which are WONDERFUL .

All in all, we had a very good time staying here and I would stay again.

title: Surprisingly, it was very decent
text:
Hotel was greatly situated close to the Duomo. Very close to a lot of stops, esp Toro Firenze, Jimmy Leather, Sabani and other major leather outlets.

No complaints. Big enough rooms for my 2 sisters and myself.

Only complaint was the traffic outside but I'm a New Yorker so I'm used to the noise and can sleep thru it all.

Breakfast, especially the American Breakfast, was very welcomed.

title: Absolutely BELLISIMO pieces
text:
Found it by accident in 2017
Went back in October 2018
Even more beautiful necklace and earrings
The updated version of what i purchased in 2017
I bought them!!

Love her work!!
Absolutely STUNNING!!

title: Bella!! Muta Bella!!
text:
Funghi, bafala mozzarella..One of the BIGGEST pizza I’ve ever seen brought to me,

The flavors —> WONDERFUL, mouthwatering!!

Loved it!! And the free bread and olive oil accompanying it..so GOOD and warm!!

And the moscato for after dinner..SO AMAZINGLY good!!

Loved the entire experience!! Definitely a must go back!!

title: My SANDALI are MUTA BELLISIMO
text:
Grt work!!

Grt peices!!

So glad i stopped here in Sorrento!!

And the heels on my sandali were great!! Can’t wear flats so glad he had heels.

Great workmanship and it’s custom made abd LEATHER!!

DEFINITELY will come again next tine vacationing in ITALIA!!:

title: Bags
text:
Lovely bags!! Leather city excites once again.
Their collection are superb and you almost can’t buy just 1.

Love visiting this store. Friendly and inviting and very accommodating with great suggestions upon inquiry.

Loved this store!!

title: Leather City galore!!
text:
Lovely. Bought many things from here.
Leather coats, leather coats abd more leather coats!!

Leather city was FABULOUS!!

Did I forget to mention leather belts as well??

title: Bell Tower abd its height
text:
Once again..
Walked up the Bell Tower..
Freaking AMAZING!!

High and windy but the view from this height —> TRULY spectacular!!
place: Duomo - Cattedrale di Santa Maria del Fiore

title: Wonder of all wonder
text:
Climbed this Duomo. Very interesting.
View from on top SPECTACULAR!!

Highly recommended for all, over appropriate age, of course since it does gets VERY interesting climbing towards the very top.

title: Pizza, Pizza and more PIZZA
text:
Love this restaurant.
Total pizza fan and they make some of the BEST pizza around.

Found it by accident and whenever visiting Firenze, it’s a MUST stop!!
Had dinner there 2 nights in a row.

The pizza is just GLORIOUS!!

Truly highly recommended!!!!

title: Beautiful blue leather jacket
text:
Blue leather jacket that’s ABSOLUTELY beautiful!!
And then a JEM of a burgundy/wine jacket that I could NOT resist and had to buy!!

Definitely recommend this shop very highly and it truly is a MUST see and MUST buy whike shopping for leather in FIRENZE!!!

title: WOBDERFUL bags!!
text:
Couldn’t go last year since they were striking via bus system.
FINALLY able to go a day ago. Their merchandise is WONDERFUL!! ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL!!

Loved their bags. Bought 2 of them for a very good friend who loves these bags.

Absolutely GORGEOUS merchandise within store.

title: Jimmy is FANTASTIC and so is his leathers
text:
Wonderful experience. So much jackets to select amongst.
Tried on 3..1 i bought! The 2nd one was BEYOND fantastic —> it was MEANT for me. Didn’t purchase since didn’t have enough funds, but I DESPERATELY wanted to. Almost cried, literally, since I didn’t have enough funds!!

His leatger collection is THAT extensive and that WONDERFUL, GLORIOUS!!

My sister purchased 2 leather jackets. Si between us we spent over 1000€ and it was SO worth it.

Definitely will go back the next time I’m in FIRENZE!!

Absolutely one of the VERY best leather collection in FIRENZE!!!

title: Eddy was GREAT and segway is AWESOME
text:
This is the ULTIMATE way to visit Roma.
Did it last year with my mom. Did it last week with my sisters. Absolutely fantastic!!
Absolutely great experience and VERY best way to kick off trip to ROMA!!

Couldn’t recommend them enough. Fun, exhilarating and just WONDERFUL experience!!
place: Highlights of Rome by Night Segway Tour

title: Not bad at all
text:
Rome Kings Suite Hotel but we were rerouted here instead.

Not too bad. Stairs which isn't the best, but the rooms were spacious and really, that's ALL that truly matter since only utilizing room to sleep.

Will be utilizing it again for Oktobre 2018.
Friendly staff and very essentially local to ALL the major sites so that's a MAJOR plus!!!

title: Great and HUGE
text:
Fun. Walked the area for hours on end.
Had tour from Doge Basilica, walking tour and then gondola ride.

Lots of stores around this area.

Fantastic place to just hang and take GREAT pictures of Venezia.

All in all, wonderful!!!

title: St. Mark's Square..HUGE!!
text:
Fun. Walked the area for hours on end.
Had tour from Doge Basilica, walking tour and then gondola ride.

Lots of stores around this area.

Fantastic place to just hang and take GREAT pictures of Venezia.

All in all, wonderful!!!

title: Totally recommend it...fantastic way to see the island!!!
text:
Fun. Walked the area for hours on end.
Had tour from Doge Basilica, walking tour and then gondola ride.

Lots of stores around this area.

Fantastic place to just hang and take GREAT pictures of Venezia.

Took the 1 hour tour and it was great. Waterboat was great way to see all aspects of the island. Loved it!! Took over 200+ pictures easily!!!

All in all, wonderful!!!

title: THAT bridge!!!
text:
Fun. Walked the area for hours on end.
Had tour from Doge Basilica, walking tour and then gondola ride.

Lots of stores around this area.

Fantastic place to just hang and take GREAT pictures of Venezia.

All in all, wonderful!!!

title: Limoncello
text:
Fantastic shop.

Bought 2 different bottles of Limoncello.
Had quite a few samples and they were chilled and SO good!!!

Even bought some jams/spreads. Looking fwd to going back and purchasing more of these delicious spreads.

They come VERY close to the quality found at Amalfi.

title: Sour lemon and orange drops and scented SOAPS!!!
text:
Went inside and saw those scented soaps...
Bought about €50 worth...it was GRT!!!

Smelled so GOOD and the price was fantastic!!!

The lemon and orange drops were great too, but my joy at finding those scented soaps were beyond fantastic!!

Definitely will go back for those scented soaps again!!

title: It was alright
text:
2 variety allowed only...Marinara or Margherita

I like sauce less pizza so wasn’t able to modify my choice...Strike One.

Way too much sauce added..Strike 2

Not as good as they think...Strike 3..

Have NO interest in trying this again..EVER!!!

title: Loved Baci di Limoncello!!!
text:
Chilled limoncello...absolutely GRT!!
My mom didn’t like it...i DON’T believe in wasring liquor so i had her sample as well.

Loved it!!

Bought lemon drops, Baci di Limoncello and scented soaps..

LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this shop!!!

Gave us a guide of how they make limoncello..

title: Seafood..so Good!!
text:
Absolute gem of a restaurant. Went with our tourguide.

Had the grilled shrimp and rice.
Absolutely enjoyed it.
My mom had some kind of fish that she totally enjoyed.

Great restaurant who knows how to cook seafood correctly.

Definitely want to visit this restaurant and the WONDROUS beauty that is the Amalfi Coast again!!!!

title: Exquisite lace!!
text:
Absolutely beautiful lace work within.

I'm NOT a lace fan, but even I was impressed by the craftsmanship displayed within.

Some of her quality work was expensive, but the work, the exquisiteness of the work was MORE than worth the price.

Truly spectacular work!!

title: Exquisite lace seen but not purchased
text:
Will be going back in September of 2018 and hopefully all within is Made in ITALIA and not Made in China.

That would truly crush me since I love the merchandise within this store

title: Spectacular shop
text:
From outside, it looks extravagant.

Inside, even more so.
Absolutely stunning place. Loved it.

Didn't buy anything since short on time, but plan on it nxt time there in September of 2018

title: Just lovely..CAN'T say this enough
text:
Can't wait to go again nxt September.

So much to see..so little time, but will definitely make sure that I go again

Love all parts Venezia and their cousin islands of Murano, Burano and Torcello.

It's a MUST do...a hidden jewelry!!

title: The BEST..even better than Golitti
text:
Heard about this from my segway guide..

Took me a while to find the place...stumbled upon it accidentally while going to Golitti...

Found it before I got to Golitti, which is around the corner from it.

Got mixture of Fior di Latte, Pistacchio and Strataciello (chocolate chip)..

It was SO SO SO good!!
I took pictures so that I'll be able to find it when I venture back to ITALIA in September of 2018!!

title: Nice hotel on 1st journey into ITALIA
text:
Nice hotel. Right in the center of Roma.

Fontana di Trevi, Piazza di Spagna and so many things...it was awesome.

Very nice hotel that offered breakfast that was never utilized since each day we were out on tour before 0700.

But definitely would recommend.

title: It was nice
text:
It was nice. Would've enjoyed more if less people were out-touring and thus couldn't stay that long to see as much as I would've liked.

Plus it was during the Vaticani tour which was BEYOND overrated.

Why this place is considered its own country is BEYOND laughable.

BEYOND LAUGHABLE !!

But I digress...i did enjoy the Basilica but have no interest in seeing it again. Once was more than enough.

title: History is a WONDROUS thing
text:
Totally enjoyed this. Home of the Gods!! Love Greek mythology thus totally interested in this since know more of the Greek names than the Roman names, but so similar that makes very little difference.

Didn't get chance to go within, but loved it regardless.

Hopefully in September of 2018 I can venture within.

title: Love this place
text:
Absolutely lovely!!

One thing that absolutely love about Roma...its multitude of statues everywhere you look, everywhere you turn.

No place in the world like it...NOWHERE!!!

This is MUTA BELLISIMO!!!!

title: OVERRATED & CROWDED & NO ORGANIZATIONAL ENDEAVOUR
text:
There's WAY too much CRAMMED into each room without any organizational effort put in.

It's OVERWHELMINGLY chaotic. After awhile you just take pictures and don't try to comprehend the reason for The disorder that you see.

I LOVE the Borghese Museo since more organized, pieces organized in comprehensive units.

I would visit and tour the Borghese 9/10 times over going to this MESS ever again!!

title: OVERRATED
text:
Stayed outside for 30/45 mins of this tour since wasn't told that couldn't take pictures.

Thus tour guide spoke at NAUSEAM abt the different parts of this painting.

You go inside, look for 5/10 minutes and you're ready to leave.

BEYOND DISAPPOINTING!! Could've saved my €€€€ and looked at this online. Much cheaper and less DISAPPOINTED that way!!!
